name: cloudtrail-write-events
text: What are the most common CloudTrail events in the past hour excluding read-only operations?
query:
SELECT 
    EVENTNAME,
    COUNT(*) as event_count,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN ERRORCODE IS NULL THEN 1 END) as successful_count,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN USERAGENT LIKE '%terraform%' OR USERAGENT LIKE '%Terraform%' THEN 1 END) as terraform_count,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN ERRORCODE IS NULL 
               AND (USERAGENT NOT LIKE '%terraform%' AND USERAGENT NOT LIKE '%Terraform%') 
          THEN 1 END) as non_terraform_successful
FROM SAMPLE_DATABASE.SAMPLE_SCHEMA.SAMPLE_CLOUDTRAIL_TABLE
WHERE EVENTTIME >= DATEADD(hour, -1, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
  AND EVENTNAME NOT LIKE 'Describe%'
  AND EVENTNAME NOT LIKE 'Get%'
  AND EVENTNAME NOT LIKE 'List%'
  AND EVENTNAME NOT LIKE 'Lookup%'
GROUP BY EVENTNAME
ORDER BY non_terraform_successful DESC, event_count DESC
LIMIT 20

meta.sql_description: Show CloudTrail event statistics for the last {lookback_hours} hours, excluding read-only events matching {describe_pattern}, {get_pattern}, {list_pattern}, or {lookup_pattern}, with counts of Terraform usage (matching {terraform_pattern_1} or {terraform_pattern_2}), limited to top {max_results} events by non-Terraform successful operations

meta.sql_template:
SELECT 
    EVENTNAME,
    COUNT(*) as event_count,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN ERRORCODE IS NULL THEN 1 END) as successful_count,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN USERAGENT LIKE ? OR USERAGENT LIKE ? THEN 1 END) as terraform_count,
    COUNT(CASE WHEN ERRORCODE IS NULL 
               AND (USERAGENT NOT LIKE ? AND USERAGENT NOT LIKE ?) 
          THEN 1 END) as non_terraform_successful
FROM SAMPLE_DATABASE.SAMPLE_SCHEMA.SAMPLE_CLOUDTRAIL_TABLE
WHERE EVENTTIME >= DATEADD(hour, ?, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP())
  AND EVENTNAME NOT LIKE ?
  AND EVENTNAME NOT LIKE ?
  AND EVENTNAME NOT LIKE ?
  AND EVENTNAME NOT LIKE ?
GROUP BY EVENTNAME
ORDER BY non_terraform_successful DESC, event_count DESC
LIMIT ?
